featured.text: He is kind and humble, totally different from the former manager, who was _____ and bossy.
They often concern very strong or clever people who come from humble backgrounds.
At 57, Whitfield is small and pretty, witty and humble, persistent and philosophical.
But the knife had humble beginnings.

definition.en_def: Having or showing a modest or low estimate of one's own importance.
definition.example: Despite his success, he remained humble and always credited his team.
